item.title: Add Binary
item.description: Given two binary strings, return their sum (also a binary string). The input strings are both non-empty and contains only characters 1 or 0. Example 1: Input: a = "11", b = "1" Output: "100" Example 2: Input: a = "1010", b = "1011" Output: "10101" Solution: class Solution: def addBinary(self, a, b): """ :type a: str :type b: str :rtype: str """ result = [] carry = 0 i = len(a)-1 j = len(b)-1 while carry or i >= 0 or j >= 0: total = carry if i >= 0: total += int(a[i]) i -= 1 if j >= 0: total += int(b[j]) j -= 1 result.
